results.content: Clear concise and to the point.  Covered major topics quickly providing a good over view of the subject area.  The instructor communicated the subject well.  However,  it would have been nice to see more examples.
results.content_html: Clear concise and to the point. Covered major topics quickly providing a good over view of the subject area. The instructor communicated the subject well. However, it would have been nice to see more examples.

results.content: This is a very good introduction to scraping with Python, although some mention that scrapy exists is warranted.  The author clearly knows his material. Unlike some other courses, this one feels as if it was scripted carefully before hand.  Excellent job.
results.content_html: This is a very good introduction to scraping with Python, although some mention that scrapy exists is warranted. The author clearly knows his material. Unlike some other courses, this one feels as if it was scripted carefully before hand. Excellent job.

results.content: I believe the courses could show more examples, making it easier to really grasp the information.
